channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric SE -- SoMachine HVAC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric SE -- SoMachine HVAC

item.title: CVE-2019-6826|2024-08-04T20:31:04.358Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- somachine%20hvac
item.description: A CWE-426: Untrusted Search Path vulnerability exists in SoMachine HVAC v2.4.1 and earlier versions, which could cause arbitrary code execution on the system running SoMachine HVAC when a malicious DLL library is loaded by the product.
